mapper.select: SELECT /* com.qs.www.board.model.dao.FreeDAO#selectAllFreeList() */ A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.MEMBER_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.BOARD_BODY , A.DELETE_YN , A.CREATED_DATE , A.MODIFIED_DATE FROM TBL_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_TYPE = '자유'
mapper.insert: INSERT /* com.qs.www.board.model.dao.FreeDAO#insertFree() */ INTO TBL_BOARD A ( A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.MEMBER_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.BOARD_BODY , A.DELETE_YN , A.CREATED_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ title } , #{ member } , #{ type } , DEFAULT , #{ body } , DEFAULT , SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.MEMBER_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.BOARD_BODY , A.DELETE_YN , A.CREATED_DATE , A.MODIFIED_DATE FROM TBL_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_NO = #{ no }

SELECT /* com.qs.www.board.model.dao.FreeDAO#selectTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD A
JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON(A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE)
JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO)
B.CATEGORY_NAME = #{ searchValue }
B.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
A.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
A.BOARD_BODY LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
